title: Ticket #4188: Get msconfig tools into windows test environment
description: There are many tools outside of cygwin which windows testing could use. Get the msconfig directory into condor_tests for windows. A cygwin tar does not easily extract the fwtch work scripts on windows. Plus long term goal is to get rid of cygwin in testing.
check_ins: 2014-Feb-03 13:48   Check-in [39302]: Add copy of msconfig programs into condor_tests for windows. #4188 (By Bill Taylor )
creator: bt
